about_the_game:
Dragonspire is an anime action roguelike where you can take on ever-evolving challenges. Prepare to enter the world of Asteria, slash your way through hordes of mobs, collect legendary heroes, unlock new and incredible powers, challenge raid-like bosses, and so much more!

PLEASE NOTE WE HAVE REMOVED MULTIPLAYER FROM THIS VERSION OF THE GAME. IF WE ARE ABLE TO RESTORE IT IN THE FUTURE, WE WILL DO SO. THANKS FOR UNDERSTANDING!

Pick Your Hero

Choose your favorite playable character from a diverse arsenal of heroes! Breeze, Serena, and Naomi are just a few of the many heroes you will encounter (with more to come), each with their own unique personality, elemental affinity, and combat style.


Discover Powerful Crests

With more than 150 elemental crests, every run will introduce you to new destructive combinations. Discover overpowered combinations and progress even further! Depending on which crests you possess, you may even encounter special, unique crests...

Hatch Unique Companions

(Pending in a Future Version) Uncover and hatch miracle eggs during your adventures. What's inside? Billions of possible pets! Each pet will provide different benefits to your heroes, as well as accompany you on the road ahead! Who knows? Maybe you'll hatch a mythical pet...

Explore an Evolving World

Across the map, players will be able to explore numerous different regions. Each one will have unique mobs and bosses that will offer players new and exhilarating experiences. After defeating each region’s boss, players will then be able to take on the ultimate challenge.

Challenge Mighty Foes

Conquer the deepest reaches of Asteria where the enigmatic dragons reside. These beasts have a few tricks up their sleeves. Leave their trial victorious and receive magnificent rewards. Be careful though... One wrong move and you won't be coming back (oh, wait a moment... it's a roguelike, you will definitely be coming back).




Thanks for supporting our first game as an indie studio! Please follow us on Twitter (@playdragonspire) for regular updates, and don't forget to tell your friends. ❤️
detailed_description:
Early Access Roadmap



Phase I - SAGAS. Play and unlock 7 characters, battle with 8 bosses in 4 difficulties, plus a first look at our roguelike drafting systems.

Phase II - PROGRESS. Help us build our progression systems, including new loot such as gear and pets. Experience a new map with unseen biomes, bosses, and more!

Phase III - DRAGONS. Challenge mini-raid versions of our dragons to earn weekly materials. We'll also add new content across all game modes, including a new daily challenge mode.

Phase IV - PVEVP. 3v3 real-time battles where the last team standing wins; our twist on the popular "Gambit" mode in Destiny 2. Includes roguelite drafting, boss fights, and more!

Phase V - SEASON 0. Simulate global release with our pre-season, where we will test balance, fix bugs, and build excitement across the anime games community. Join us on the journey ahead!

You probably noticed there are no dates for each test. That's because we don't want to rush development, and each testing phase may include several iterations before moving on. Participating in Early Access will provide you with an opportunity to help us make Dragonspire better, speaking directly with our developers here and on Discord (link below). Thanks for your support and understanding!


Join the Community
